summary: The implementation successfully addresses REQ-1. The HomePage.tsx file shows a new About Us card section with glassmorphism styling, scroll-reveal animations using IntersectionObserver, and positioning between the hero and services sections. The frontend-file-summaries.txt explicitly confirms this: 'new About Us card section with glassmorphism styling and scroll-reveal animation positioned between hero and services'. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the available evidence.
